title: golem-powers:writing-skills - Meta-skill for creating executable skills
description: Create a meta-skill that teaches Claude how to create OTHER golem-powers skills correctly. This skill enforces the hybrid architecture: SKILL.md with execute: frontmatter + scripts/ directory. When a golem-powers skill is loaded, Claude must immediately run the execute: script.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md with frontmatter: name, description, NO execute (meta-skill)
Document the golem-powers skill structure in SKILL.md:
- SKILL.md MUST have YAML frontmatter with: name, description, execute (path to script)
- All scripts output Markdown format for Claude to parse
Document the execution rule: 'When loading a golem-powers skill with execute: frontmatter, Claude MUST run that script IMMEDIATELY via Bash before any other action'
Create template generator script: scripts/create-skill.sh that scaffolds new skill structure
Template creates: SKILL.md (with frontmatter), scripts/default.sh (executable), workflows/ (empty)
Include example in SKILL.md showing complete skill creation workflow
Create workflows/create.md - step-by-step for creating new skill
Create workflows/audit.md - checklist for verifying skill is correctly structured
Run shellcheck on all .sh files - must pass with no errors
Test: Run /golem-powers:writing-skills and verify it loads correctly
